text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

──I checked it out. It seems like the event
date and time were announced incorrectly.

I'll go outside and call out to people!
We have to gather customers by the time!

Since it's the two of you performing,
we want various people to come and watch!

──Thanks, Mei-chan. I'm in favor of
calling out to people outside, Fuyu will go too.

But it's not just "the two of you performing", right?
Mei-chan is also participating.

We're from 283 Production's Straylight~!
Come watch Fuyu and us on stage!

After this, we'll all perform on stage together!
Please come and watch!

Oh, Asahi... that's not okay.
Performing on the street without permission...

Why aren't you keeping things in control properly...!?
The event might get canceled...!

Thank you, everyone. There were some challenges,
but... we managed to gather some audience.

As long as it ended up okay, it's all good!
Let's do our best for the actual performance!
Yes!
...I wonder if it'll be okay...
──Let's start.

──Thanks for the warm welcome,
but don't you think we're still lacking?

I won't let everyone
who came today regret it.

────...But it would be great
if everyone could follow along,
(What is this...)

......Thank you for your support.
It means a lot...

For everyone...
I'll sing...
so watch closely...──!

(What are they all saying...
Every single one of them...!)
